mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_POST (SUBJECT, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{subject}, #{content}, #{writer}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_BOARD_POST WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, HIT FROM TBL_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1 AND POST_ID = #{postId} LIMIT 1
SELECT POST_ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, HIT FROM TBL_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY POST_ID DESC, REG_DATE DESC
SELECT POST_ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, HIT FROM TBL_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY POST_ID DESC, REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{numPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM TBL_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1
